original_text: They continued to use the idol Micah had made, all the time the house of God was in Shiloh.
korean_text: 하나님의 집이 실로에 있을 동안에 미가가 만든 바 새긴 신상이 단 자손에게 있었더라

sentences.original_text: They continued to use the idol
all the time the house of God was in Shiloh
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 집이 실로에 있는 동안 내내
